cont.entity_b: Installation took about 10 minutes. Requires checking thresholds and door space before installation. Easily installed on a swing-in door. Installation is straightforward and requires screwing into the door.
Priced cheaper than Home Depot or Lowe's.

cont.entity_a: Enclosed screws may strip out; hex head screws recommended for installation. Extra screw at each end is recommended to prevent bending.
cont.entity_b: Comes with 4 screws, although 7 were pictured, but only 4 are needed. Build quality is good and comes with matched screws. Quality is good, but screws were not included as stated. Customer service was helpful in providing extra screws.

cont.entity_a: Product arrived bent in two places despite undamaged packaging. Product arrived in perfect condition as described.
cont.entity_b: Product color was different from what was pictured and described.

cont.entity_a: Well-made and suitable for replacing sweeps on all outside doors. Expected to last several years due to good quality.
cont.entity_b: Hard rubber or plastic does not break or crack. Rubber sweeper is sturdy and expected to last long. Paint peeled after a year.

Draft.comm: Effective in sealing the bottom of a large door. Prevents drafts.

cont.entity_a: Eliminating the need for rolled towels under doors.
cont.entity_b: Product looks great and solved the draft problem. Works well to reduce drafts. Forms a good seal with the metal bottom plate of the door frame. Does not completely seal sides adjacent to the bottom.

cont.entity_a: Matched existing screw holes on 48" doors. Difficult to find this size, 48", at local retailers.
cont.entity_b: Requires trimming for proper fit. Rubber part is longer and can be cut to size. Effectively seals a 1/2" gap beneath exterior French doors.

cont.entity_a: Each ordered item was shipped separately.

cont.entity_b: ORB Finish bubbled and peeled after rain exposure.
